humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the maximum dimension of the invasive component of the tumor as 4 cm. Based on the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the maximum dimension of the tumor is 4 cm (part B, point 2 of the final diagnosis), which falls within the T2 category (tumor size 2-5 cm) of the TNM staging system for breast cancer.
